name: 3D Truck Parking Simulator: HTV Driving Test
name_original: 3D Truck Parking Simulator: HTV Driving Test
description:
Are you ready to handle the most difficult Heavy Traffic Vehicles (HTV)? Accept the most interesting heavy duty automobiles driving and parking challenge that will amaze and entertain you at the same time. Become a heavy duty truck driver in 3D Truck Parking Simulator: HTV Driving Test. The game simulates various parking situations that you may encounter in the career of a real trucker. In this 3D truck parking game you can change the overall view of the truck's position in different 3D optic angles. Change the view to bird view to have a good idea how much space is left when you park your truck as a legendary driver king in this3D Truck Parking Simulator: HTV Driving Test truck parking game. Control multiple truck, trailers, buses, army vehicles with a steering wheel, acceleration and brake pedal. Steer your trucks into the right parking spot, put the gear into park and round up your mission as a truck driver in this 3D truck parking game.

3D Truck Parking Simulator: HTV Driving Test will put you in the exciting situation of a real life trucker in a real trucks! Driving around numerous challenging driving and parking levels in city, busy traffic, small parking areas is not for the faint of heart, so make sure you’re up for the task in these truck games and parking games!

Game features:
- Best parking simulator game physics
- Different HD camera views during driving
- Multiple Real Life Heavy Duty Trucks, Buses, Vehicles & Automobiles
- Real 3D Graphs and Environment
- Addictive driving and parking levels
